papers.title: BELT:Bootstrapping Electroencephalography-to-Language Decoding and Zero-Shot Sentiment Classification by Natural Language Supervision

reasons: EEG is central modality for brain-to-language translation
Presents BELT framework for EEG representation learning
Utilizes large language models for EEG-FM style pretraining
Achieves state-of-the-art results on EEG decoding tasks
